name: ddbrest
description: rest client for the DDB API

scripts.travis: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.build: mkdir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify lib/ddbrest.js > dist/ddbrest.js && ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs dist/ddbrest.js -c > dist/ddbrest.min.js

author: Christian Bromann <mail@christian-bromann.com>
